Message:
The Duke’s mansion...
was where I found her.

The little sister...
of the final witch I had killed.

I don’t know when
she first arrived.

But, it seems she’s told
the others that she’d
come here looking for me.

If that girl so wishes,
I will gladly forfeit my life to her.

I will do so...until she
chooses to enact her revenge.

But...if there is someone
looking down on us...
Please, protect her.

At least let me,
who couldn’t even
save my own sister...
save that girl.

and I’m sure...
she doesn’t want this
from the likes of me...
